title: NC Law Restricts Public Access to Body Cam Footage (Audio)
itunes:title: NC Law Restricts Public Access to Body Cam Footage (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Mary Fan, a professor at the University of Washington, disucss new legislation in North Carolina that restricts public access to policy body cam footage. She speaks with June Grasso and Michael Best on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
